name: The Journey of Elira
description:
A Short Background Story

"Where is this place?"

An ordinary high school girl, Elira, is inexplicably caught in a strange dream.

Elira finds out that she's dressed as a witch and becomes a magical girl, which is exactly what she yearns for. 

However......

"What are they?"

While Elira was still admiring her magical girl form, she cruised into an unfamiliar area. At this time, bullets of different shapes flew toward her, ready to take her life.

Elira deftly dodged the bullets, but more bullets flew toward her.

At this moment, Elira realized that being a magical girl was not very pleasant. In this "fairytale nightmare"-like a journey, as a magical girl, the first thing she needs to learn is how to survive.

Game Play

--The tone of the game is light hearted with the colors and characters we made. In this game you play as Elira, who is trying to regain her powers by reclaiming her spellbooks. In this game you should feel weak, and as you play you get stronger.

Credits:

Kevin Khau (Game Design)

Jia Mei (Programming)

Uni Huang (Art/Music)
